segments.text: My attention is drawn to the boy precariously balanced on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching high into the open cabinet, a small plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That cookie jar is the clear target of his ambitious climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly beneath him; its legs are splayed outward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, his little body is almost horizontal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it tilting backward, just slightly, but enough to worry me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he could come crashing down, along with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His focus is entirely on getting those treats, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He really wants those cookies, that much is obvious from his posture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he maintains his balance, or someone notices soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The height from that stool could lead to a nasty bump.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a classic mischievous act, executed with such determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sibling is right there, waiting for her share, complicit in the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR
